content: happy with the fit do a little dance stitches before previous wrap turn mds and move on to the next section if you decide that you would like some more length in the row 4 ws purl back to bor sm purl to 10 yoke please do keep knitting to your required stitches before previous wrap turn mds length before splitting for body and sleeves row 5-8 repeat row 3-4 twice more **continue to knit in the round until yoke measures 7 8 9 9 5 10 10 75 11 25 12 25 row 9 rs - knit back to bor 12 5 inches or 17 20 22 24 26 27 28 31 31 cm measuring from the centre front cast on edge row 10 rs resume knitting in the round including ribbing complete one full round knitting the double stitches as you come to them end of short row splitting the body and sleeves knit to the first marker rm place the next 49 55 59 65 69 73 75 81 83 stitches onto a stitch holder or scrap yarn for the right sleeve rm and then place one more stitch onto the waste yarn for the right sleeve cast on 8 8 10 12 14 14 14 14 16 new stitches for the underarm using the backwards loop cast on knit to next marker rm place the next 49 55 59 65 69 73 75 81 83 stitches onto a stitch holder or scrap yarn for the left sleeve rm and then place one more stitch onto the waste yarn for the left sleeve cast on 8 8 10 12 14 14 14 14 16 new stitches for the underarm using the backwards loop cast on knit to bor there are now 164 176 188 204 216 232 244 256 272 body stitches and 50 56 60 66 70 74 76 82 84 stitches on hold for each sleeve the colour block boxy tee - victoria lewis - tiny teal handcrafted - copyright 2021 5 knitting the body knitting the sleeves **this is another great place to consider your the sleeves are then picked up and worked in the perfect sweater do you like a cropped body round on the larger double-pointed needles or length that you could wear with high-waisted on a circular needle if you are using the magic jeans or dresses or do you prefer a longer body loop technique length it is your sweater…make it your way place the stitches that were put on hold for one continue to knit in the round using your main sleeve back onto your needles using mc pick up colour until the sweater body measures 10 and knit 8 8 10 12 14 14 14 14 16 stitches inches or 25cm measuring from the new cast on into the newly cast on underarm stitches there stitches in the underarm or until the body is 2 are now a total of 58 64 70 78 84 88 90 96
